# default7702GasEstimator

A middleware function to estimate the gas usage of a user operation with an optional custom gas estimator.
This function is only compatible with accounts using EntryPoint v0.7.0.

## Import

```ts
import { default7702GasEstimator } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Parameters

### gasEstimator

`ClientMiddlewareFn`
An optional custom gas estimator function

## Returns

`Function`
A function that takes user operation structure and parameters, estimates gas usage, and returns the estimated user operation
